text.div:
Base FHIR Conformance Statement (Full)

This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the full set of functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from

ModeSERVER
DescriptionAll the functionality defined in FHIR
Transactiony
System Historyy
System Searchy
Resource TypeProfileReadV-ReadSearchUpdateUpdatesCreateDeleteHistory

name: Base FHIR Conformance Statement (Full)
description: This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the full set of functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from

rest.documentation: All the functionality defined in FHIR

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Alert creator

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list alerts for

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list alerts for

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: unconfirmed | confirmed | resolved | refuted

searchParam.name: onset
searchParam.documentation: Date(/time) when manifestations showed

searchParam.name: last-date
searchParam.documentation: Date(/time) of last known occurence of a reaction

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When recorded

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: immune | non-immune - Underlying mechanism (if known)

searchParam.name: reporter
searchParam.documentation: Source of the information about the allergy

searchParam.name: substance
searchParam.documentation: Substance, (or class) considered to be responsible for risk

searchParam.name: criticality
searchParam.documentation: low | high | unassessible - Estimated potential clinical harm

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: food | medication | environment - Category of Substance

searchParam.name: duration
searchParam.documentation: How long Manifestations persisted

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who the sensitivity is for

searchParam.name: recorder
searchParam.documentation: Who recorded the sensitivity

searchParam.name: route
searchParam.documentation: How the subject was exposed to the substance

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: External Ids for this item

searchParam.name: manifestation
searchParam.documentation: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

searchParam.name: partstatus
searchParam.documentation: The Participation status of the subject, or other participant on the appointment. Can be used to locate participants that have not responded to meeting requests.

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The overall status of the appointment

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Any one of the individuals participating in the appointment

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Appointment date/time.

searchParam.name: partstatus
searchParam.documentation: The participants acceptance status for this appointment

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: This Response is for this Patient

searchParam.name: practitioner
searchParam.documentation: This Response is for this Practitioner

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: This Response is for this Location

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: The Person, Location/HealthcareService or Device that this appointment response replies for

searchParam.name: appointment
searchParam.documentation: The appointment that the response is attached to

searchParam.name: site
searchParam.documentation: Logical source location within the enterprise

searchParam.name: desc
searchParam.documentation: Instance-specific descriptor for Object

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Type/identifier of event

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time when the event occurred on source

searchParam.name: reference
searchParam.documentation: Specific instance of resource (e.g. versioned)

searchParam.name: identity
searchParam.documentation: Specific instance of object (e.g. versioned)

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: A patient that the .object.reference refers to

searchParam.name: altid
searchParam.documentation: Alternative User id e.g. authentication

searchParam.name: patientid
searchParam.documentation: The id of the patient (one of multiple kinds of participations)

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: The id of source where event originated

searchParam.name: address
searchParam.documentation: Identifier for the network access point of the user device

searchParam.name: subtype
searchParam.documentation: More specific type/id for the event

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Human-meaningful name for the user

searchParam.name: action
searchParam.documentation: Type of action performed during the event

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Direct reference to resource

searchParam.name: policy
searchParam.documentation: Policy that authorized event

searchParam.name: object-type
searchParam.documentation: Object type being audited

searchParam.name: user
searchParam.documentation: Unique identifier for the user

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who created

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Identifies the

searchParam.name: created
searchParam.documentation: When created

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Identifies the

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Kind of Resource

searchParam.name: contenttype
searchParam.documentation: MimeType of the binary content

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Named anatomical location

searchParam.name: message
searchParam.documentation: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "message" - this is a message header, and this parameter provides access to search its contents

searchParam.name: composition
searchParam.documentation: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "document" - this is a composition, and this parameter provides access to searches its contents

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | history | searchset | collection

searchParam.name: activitycode
searchParam.documentation: Detail type of activity

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who care plan is for

searchParam.name: condition
searchParam.documentation: Health issues this plan addresses

searchParam.name: activitydetail
searchParam.documentation: Activity details defined in specific resource

searchParam.name: activitydate
searchParam.documentation: Specified date occurs within period specified by CarePlan.activity.timingSchedule

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Matches if the practitioner is listed as a performer in any of the "simple" activities.  (For performers of the detailed activities, chain through the activitydetail search parameter.)

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Who is involved

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who care plan is for

searchParam.name: condition
searchParam.documentation: Health issues this plan addresses

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Who is involved

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Patient

searchParam.name: priority
searchParam.documentation: Processing priority requested

searchParam.name: use
searchParam.documentation: The kind of financial resource

searchParam.name: provider
searchParam.documentation: Provider responsible for the claim

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The primary identifier of the financial resource

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the insurer

searchParam.name: assessor
searchParam.documentation: The clinician performing the assessment

searchParam.name: trigger
searchParam.documentation: Request or event that necessitated this assessment

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient being asssesed

searchParam.name: plan
searchParam.documentation: Plan of action after assessment

searchParam.name: resolved
searchParam.documentation: Diagnosies/conditions resolved since previous assessment

searchParam.name: trigger-code
searchParam.documentation: Request or event that necessitated this assessment

searchParam.name: previous
searchParam.documentation: Reference to last assessment

searchParam.name: action
searchParam.documentation: Actions taken during assessment

searchParam.name: finding
searchParam.documentation: Specific text or code for finding

searchParam.name: investigation
searchParam.documentation: Record of a specific investigation

searchParam.name: problem
searchParam.documentation: General assessment of patient state

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When the assessment occurred

searchParam.name: ruledout
searchParam.documentation: Specific text of code for diagnosis

searchParam.name: sender
searchParam.documentation: Message sender

searchParam.name: sent
searchParam.documentation: When sent

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Message category

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Focus of message

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: in-progress | completed | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Focus of message

searchParam.name: received
searchParam.documentation: When received

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter leading to message

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique identifier

searchParam.name: medium
searchParam.documentation: Communication medium

searchParam.name: recipient
searchParam.documentation: Message recipient

searchParam.name: sender
searchParam.documentation: Message sender

searchParam.name: time
searchParam.documentation: When scheduled

searchParam.name: requester
searchParam.documentation: Requester of communication

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: Message category

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Focus of message

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: proposed | planned | requested | received | accepted | in-progress | completed | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: priority
searchParam.documentation: Message urgency

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Focus of message

searchParam.name: ordered
searchParam.documentation: When ordered or proposed

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter leading to message

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique identifier

searchParam.name: medium
searchParam.documentation: Communication medium

searchParam.name: recipient
searchParam.documentation: Message recipient

searchParam.name: section-code
searchParam.documentation: Classification of section (recommended)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: preliminary | final | appended | amended | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what the composition is about

searchParam.name: class
searchParam.documentation: Categorization of Composition

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Context of the conposition

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: The period covered by the documentation

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Kind of composition (LOINC if possible)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Composition editing time

searchParam.name: section
searchParam.documentation: The Content of the section (narrative + data entries)

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what authored the composition

searchParam.name: title
searchParam.documentation: Human Readable name/title

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what the composition is about

searchParam.name: attester
searchParam.documentation: Who attested the composition

searchParam.name: confidentiality
searchParam.documentation: As defined by affinity domain

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: Code(s) that apply to the event being documented

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Logical identifier of composition (version-independent)

searchParam.name: dependson
searchParam.documentation: Reference to element/field/valueset mapping depends on

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Status of the concept map

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The concept map publication date

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The url of the concept map

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The version identifier of the concept map

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the concept map

searchParam.name: product
searchParam.documentation: Reference to element/field/valueset mapping depends on

searchParam.name: system
searchParam.documentation: The system for any destination concepts mapped by this map

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: The system for any concepts mapped by this concept map

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Text search in the description of the concept map

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Name of the concept map

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: A use context assigned to the concept map

searchParam.name: target
searchParam.documentation: Provides context to the mappings

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Additional identifier for the concept map

searchParam.name: asserter
searchParam.documentation: Person who asserts this condition

searchParam.name: following-code
searchParam.documentation: Relationship target by means of a predefined code

searchParam.name: dueto-code
searchParam.documentation: Relationship target by means of a predefined code

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Location - may include laterality

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: onset
searchParam.documentation: Date related onsets (dateTime and Period)

searchParam.name: evidence
searchParam.documentation: Manifestation/symptom

searchParam.name: onset-info
searchParam.documentation: Other onsets (boolean, age, range, string)

searchParam.name: following-item
searchParam.documentation: Relationship target resource

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: The severity of the condition

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code for the condition

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter when condition first asserted

searchParam.name: date-asserted
searchParam.documentation: When first detected/suspected/entered

searchParam.name: stage
searchParam.documentation: Simple summary (disease specific)

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The category of the condition

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: dueto-item
searchParam.documentation: Relationship target resource

searchParam.name: clinicalstatus
searchParam.documentation: The clinical status of the condition

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: resource
searchParam.documentation: Name of a resource mentioned in a conformance statement

searchParam.name: security
searchParam.documentation: Information about security of implementation

searchParam.name: format
searchParam.documentation: formats supported (xml | json | mime type)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The conformance statement publication date

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The uri that identifies the conformance statement

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The version identifier of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: mode
searchParam.documentation: Mode - restful (server/client) or messaging (sender/receiver)

searchParam.name: software
searchParam.documentation: Part of a the name of a software application

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Text search in the description of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: event
searchParam.documentation: Event code in a conformance statement

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Name of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: supported-profile
searchParam.documentation: Profiles supported by the system

searchParam.name: fhirversion
searchParam.documentation: The version of FHIR

searchParam.name: profile
searchParam.documentation: A profile id invoked in a conformance statement

searchParam.name: signer
searchParam.documentation: Contract Signatory Party

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the target of the contract (if a patient)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the target of the contract

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Contract Actor Type

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the contract

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who found issue?

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: E.g. Drug-drug, duplicate therapy, etc.

searchParam.name: implicated
searchParam.documentation: Problem resource

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Associated patient

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When identified

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique id for the contraindication

searchParam.name: plan
searchParam.documentation: A plan or policy identifier

searchParam.name: issuer
searchParam.documentation: The identity of the insurer

searchParam.name: sequence
searchParam.documentation: Sequence number

searchParam.name: dependent
searchParam.documentation: Dependent number

searchParam.name: group
searchParam.documentation: Group identifier

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The kind of coverage

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The primary identifier of the insured

searchParam.name: subplan
searchParam.documentation: Sub-plan identifier

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the data element

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Text search in the description of the data element.  This corresponds to the definition of the first DataElement.element.

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Name of the data element

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: A use context assigned to the data element

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: A code for the data element (server may choose to do subsumption)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The data element publication date

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The identifier of the data element

searchParam.name: url
searchParam.documentation: The official URL for the data element

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the data element

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The version identifier of the data element

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization responsible for the device

searchParam.name: model
searchParam.documentation: The model of the device

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Patient information, if the resource is affixed to a person

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: A location, where the resource is found

searchParam.name: manufacturer
searchParam.documentation: The manufacturer of the device

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The type of the device

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Instance id from manufacturer, owner, regulatory agencies and others

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: The device source

searchParam.name: parent
searchParam.documentation: The parent DeviceComponent resource

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The device component type

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The category of the metric

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: The device resource

searchParam.name: parent
searchParam.documentation: The parent DeviceMetric resource

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The component type

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The identifier of the metric

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Search by subject - a patient

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Search by subject

searchParam.name: device
searchParam.documentation: Device requested

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Search by subject - a patient

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Search by subject

searchParam.name: device
searchParam.documentation: Search by device

searchParam.name: orderer
searchParam.documentation: Who ordered the test

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: proposed | draft | planned | requested | received | accepted | in-progress | review | completed | cancelled | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what test is about

searchParam.name: item-status
searchParam.documentation: proposed | draft | planned | requested | received | accepted | in-progress | review | completed | cancelled | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: event-status
searchParam.documentation: proposed | draft | planned | requested | received | accepted | in-progress | review | completed | cancelled | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Who recorded or did this

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code to indicate the item (test or panel) being ordered

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The encounter that this diagnostic order is associated with

searchParam.name: item-past-status
searchParam.documentation: proposed | draft | planned | requested | received | accepted | in-progress | review | completed | cancelled | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what test is about

searchParam.name: bodysite
searchParam.documentation: Location of requested test (if applicable)

searchParam.name: item-date
searchParam.documentation: The date at which the event happened

searchParam.name: specimen
searchParam.documentation: If the whole order relates to specific specimens

searchParam.name: event-status-date
searchParam.documentation: A combination of past-status and date

searchParam.name: event-date
searchParam.documentation: The date at which the event happened

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifiers assigned to this order

searchParam.name: item-status-date
searchParam.documentation: A combination of item-past-status and item-date

searchParam.name: result
searchParam.documentation: Link to an atomic result (observation resource)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the report

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the report

searchParam.name: issued
searchParam.documentation: When the report was issued

searchParam.name: diagnosis
searchParam.documentation: A coded diagnosis on the report

searchParam.name: image
searchParam.documentation: Reference to the image source

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The Encounter when the order was made

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The clinically relevant time of the report

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the report if a patient

searchParam.name: request
searchParam.documentation: What was requested

searchParam.name: specimen
searchParam.documentation: The specimen details

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: The name of the report (e.g. the code for the report as a whole, as opposed to codes for the atomic results, which are the names on the observation resource referred to from the result)

searchParam.name: service
searchParam.documentation: Which diagnostic discipline/department created the report

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who was the source of the report (organization)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An identifier for the report

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: current | superceded | entered-in-error

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the set of documents

searchParam.name: relatedids
searchParam.documentation: Related Identifier

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: What kind of document set this is

searchParam.name: recipient
searchParam.documentation: Intended to get notified about this set of documents

searchParam.name: content
searchParam.documentation: Contents of this set of documents

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who and/or what authored the document

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the set of documents

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: The source system/application/software

searchParam.name: created
searchParam.documentation: When this document manifest created

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Human-readable description (title)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique Identifier for the set of documents

searchParam.name: relatedrefs
searchParam.documentation: Related Resource

searchParam.name: location
